result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing a GraphQL client and defining request structures for querying staked amounts.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client functionality and data models related to GraphQL requests.

internal/infras/indexer/client.go.purpose: This file implements a GraphQL client for fetching staked amounts of Ron from a specified endpoint.

internal/infras/indexer/models.go.purpose: Defines GraphQL request structures for querying staked amounts by user address.
